content.headline: What's on
content.description: Today's programme guide. Click on a highlighted programme to pursue travel to a choice, related location; or search for your programme directly.
content.locationEnticement: Find out more about a related location

content.flightsInfoDescription: Look for an upcoming, connecting flight to an airport near {0}.
content.flightsApiDisclaimer: This site uses a free tier of the Amadeus api. Information is available for a limited number of existing airports. We find the nearest airport to a specific location only from within that subset. In the process, we may fail to return airports that really are nearby.
content.getAirportsNearMe: Look for an airport near me.
